How to Play:

- Join one of our exciting tournaments (Either for our virtual currency or Real Money) and put your Solitaire skills to the test against other users at your level.

- Tap and drag cards to build a sequence in descending order and alternating colors in the tableau- The seven columns of cards in the game.

- If you uncover an ace, place it in one of the 4 foundations- The stack piles at the top of the board.

- If you uncover a king, you can place it in one of the empty spots in the tableau.

- If you no longer have face-up cards to move, tap on the stockpile to see if you can play a card.

- The aim is to build sequences of the same suit in one of the four stack piles at the top of the board.

- When you are out of moves, submit your score and take advantage of the bigger time bonus for finishing early.

- Timing is key. The faster you clear the board, the higher you rank, the bigger prize you will get!

- The top 3 finishers will win real money or gems (our virtual currency).

- Keep playing to win daily rewards and treats.

- Enjoy our unique and special events.
